topics.title: Explainable Reinforcement Learning for Real-World Applications
topics.rationale: Reinforcement learning (RL) has shown great promise in solving complex problems, but its lack of interpretability has hindered its adoption in real-world applications. Explainable RL aims to address this issue by providing insights into the decision-making process of RL agents. This topic has the potential to revolutionize industries such as healthcare, finance, and transportation.

topics.title: Multi-Modal Fusion for Medical Imaging Analysis
topics.rationale: Medical imaging analysis has become increasingly important in healthcare, but the complexity of medical images makes it challenging to analyze them accurately. Multi-modal fusion aims to combine different types of imaging data (e.g., MRI, CT, X-ray) to improve diagnosis accuracy and reduce false positives. This topic has the potential to transform medical imaging analysis and improve patient outcomes.

topics.title: Adversarial Robustness for Edge AI Applications
topics.rationale: Edge AI applications, such as autonomous vehicles and smart homes, require robustness against adversarial attacks. Adversarial robustness aims to design AI systems that can withstand attacks and maintain their performance. This topic has the potential to improve the security and reliability of edge AI applications.
